# Babote

## Ingredients

* 250g (about 0.5 lb) beef
* 250g (agout (0.5 lb) mutton
* 1 Tbl apricot jam
* 1 Tbl mango chutney
* 1 Tbl venegar
* 1 tsp Worchester sauce
* 0.5 cup raisins
* 2 eggs
* 1 slice of bread softened in milk
* 2 onions fried in oil with 1 Tbl curry powder
* 1 handful of almonds
* 2 bay leaves
* 0.5 cup milk

## Ingredients

Mix all except 1 egg, milk, almonds and bay leaves together and place in a greased baking dish. Top with a handful of almods and 2 bay leaves. Bake at 350&deg;F for 45 minutes. Beat the remaining egg with about 0.5 cup milk and pour over the meat. Bake an additional 10 minutes. Serve hot or cold; great for a picnic hte next day.
